radiographic_examinations.findings: Paucity of ADAM17 expression in the skin and small intestine.
Absence of ADAM17 expression in PBMCs and keratinocyte lysates from the affected boy.
Evidence of a mononuclear-cell infiltrate, villus blunting, and lengthening of crypts in the affected girl; similar findings in the affected boy but more variable.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Intestines of the affected children were substantially normal later in life.
